title: John Coltrane - Afro Blue Impressions 1963 / 2013 Reissue
description:
Recorded at concerts in late 1963 in Berlin and Stockholm, the John Coltrane Quartet is in tremendous form here. The music brims with the wonder and the power of discovery. 
"A Love Supreme" is widely considered the ultimate statement from Coltrane's classic 1960s quartet, with McCoy Tyner, Jimmy Garrison and Elvin Jones. 
But "Afro Blue Impressions", recorded a year earlier, rivals any other live Coltrane recording for beauty and intensity. 
One of the best live jazz albums ever made.


John Coltrane

Afro Blue Impressions

Recorded in 1963, released in 1977


 2CDs / 2013 / Remastered / 320Kbps


Tracklist:

Disc 1:	
 	
1. Lonnie's Lament 

2. Naima 

3. Chasin' The Trane 

4. My Favorite Things

5. Afro Blue 

6. Cousin Mary 


Disc 2:	
 	
1. I Want To Talk About You 

2. Spiritual 

3. Impressions 

4. Naima* 

5. I Want To Talk About You* 

6. My Favorite Things* 

Recorded live on October 22, 1963 at Konserthuset, Stockholm (CD 2 #2-6) 
and on November 2, 1963 at Auditorium Maximum, Freie UniversitÃƒÂ¤t Berlin, Berlin (CD 1 #1-6, CD 2 #1)
